name: GLIIF, LLC
overview:
GLIIF, LLC has developed a patent pending technology that allows for branded print to web interface for advertising and marketing purposes and provides a secure interface for eCommerce and mCommerce financial transactions.

We are attacking the outdated QR Code technology and doing this at a very low cost of entry.

Print Advertisement & Branding Each GLIIF generated allows for user selected color combinations. Blend it into existing publications and art work. Corporate accounts available. No Max. character restrictions w/ action item inserts.

We also have developed on a per impression basis pre re-direction ad services.

eGLIIF Commerce Solutions Our Commerce solution supports Mobile Commerce, eCommerce and newly introduced pCommerce, print to purchase technology. Secure multi-point verification system. Fight Credit Fraud and Identity Theft.

Secure Communication Every GLIIF purchased has the option to add password protection. This limits access to information to a select distribution list.
